name: Decentralized Trade Networks
description: Building alternative trade systems that bypass centralized financial control.
focus: Resisting Economic Sanctions and Trade Embargoes

cards.title: Creating Independent Trade Systems
cards.description: Designing resilient trade networks outside of traditional banking and corporate monopolies.
bulletpoints: Building decentralized marketplaces using blockchain and crypto.
Leveraging community trade hubs to bypass supply chain restrictions.
Implementing mutual aid economies to maintain stability in economic crises.

cards.title: Bypassing Sanctions and Trade Barriers
cards.description: Circumventing economic warfare tactics designed to starve out resistance groups.
bulletpoints: Identifying legal loopholes to maintain trade in restricted markets.
Utilizing barter, cryptocurrency, and underground networks to secure essential resources.
Building international alliances to bypass targeted economic isolation tactics.

cards.title: Sustaining Economic Independence
cards.description: Ensuring long-term financial resilience through decentralized systems.
bulletpoints: Developing local and regional production capabilities.
Using privacy-focused financial technologies to prevent asset seizure.
Teaching economic literacy to strengthen resistance networks.
